hibernate-mapping.query: select new coadto( c.ACode, c.DCODE ) from PFMORM00024 as c where c.ACode = :aCode and c.DCODE = :sourceBranchCode
select new coadto( c.ACode,c.AccountName,c.DCODE ) from PFMORM00024 as c inner join c.COAAccountName as cs where cs.AccountName=:sourceBankAccountName or cs.AccountName=:otherBankAccountName
select new coadto (c.AccountName) from PFMORM00024 as c where ACode = :acode and Active = true
select new coadto( c.ACode ) from PFMORM00024 as c inner join c.COAAccountName as cs where cs.AccountName = :accountName and cs.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBranchCode
select new coadto( c.AccountName ) from PFMORM00024 as c where ACode = :encashAccount
select new coadto( c.ACode ) from PFMORM00024 as c where ACode = :aCode and Active = true
select new coadto( c.ACode ) from PFMORM00024 as c where ( c.ACode =: aCode and c.DCODE=: sourceBr and c.Active = true ) or c.AccountName =: aCName

select new coadto( c.ACode, c.AccountName, c.DCODE, c.ACType, c.PDate, c.CBMACode, c.Active, c.TS, c.CreatedDate, c.CreatedUserId, c.UpdatedDate, c.UpdatedUserId ) from PFMORM00024 as c where c.Active = true

select new coadto( c.ACode, c.AccountName, c.DCODE, c.ACType, c.PDate, c.CBMACode, c.Active, c.TS, c.CreatedDate, c.CreatedUserId, c.UpdatedDate, c.UpdatedUserId ) from PFMORM00024 as c where c.ACode = :aCode and c.Active = true

select new coadto( c.ACode, c.AccountName, c.DCODE, c.ACType, c.PDate, c.CBMACode, c.Active, c.TS, c.CreatedDate, c.CreatedUserId, c.UpdatedDate, c.UpdatedUserId ) from PFMORM00024 as c where c.ACode = :aCode and c.DCODE = :sourceBranchCode and c.Active = true
